code: import React from"react";import{Container,Row,Col}from"reactstrap";import categoryImg01 from"../../../assets/images/category-01.png";import categoryImg02 from"../../../assets/images/category-02.png";import categoryImg03 from"../../../assets/images/category-03.png";import categoryImg04 from"../../../assets/images/category-04.png";import"../../../styles/category.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const categoryData=[{display:"Fastfood",imgUrl:categoryImg01},{display:"Pizza",imgUrl:categoryImg02},{display:"Asian Food",imgUrl:categoryImg03},{display:"Row Meat",imgUrl:categoryImg04}];const Category=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:categoryData.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"3",md:"4",sm:"6",xs:"6",className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category__item d-flex align-items-center gap-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category__img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.imgUrl,alt:"category__item"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{children:item.display})]})},index))})});};export default Category;
